![VZCRA Logo - 12-2022](https://www.willspointtx.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?rf=t&i=agGaScZhEU8CgZvNBnuxkqQ4SjjDFFI0H1fAxVOH0nvfyovQWk37oUE661NKTkp3&s=large)

ADDENDUM #1 TO BID #VZCRATAXI125-R1

**Posted On:** November 25, 2025

**Addendum No. 1 – VZCRATAXI25-R1**

**Date: November 25, 2025**

**Project: Re-Bid Partial Parallel Taxiway Construction**

**Location: Van Zandt County Regional Airport, Wills Point, Texas**

**Contractor: [Insert Contractor's Name]**

**Subject: Value Engineering Proposals**

**Purpose:** This addendum outlines value engineering proposals intended to enhance project efficiency and reduce costs while maintaining the overall quality and integrity of the project.

**Proposed Changes:** The following changes are proposed as part of the value engineering process:

* **Item 1: Removal and On-Site Stockpiling of Topsoil**  
  + Current Method: [Brief description of the current method or material]
* + Proposed Change: Depth of 4.5” to remove all organic material
* **Item 2: 2,240 Cubic Yards of Select Fill**  
  + Current Method: [Brief description of the current method or material]
* + Proposed Change: The length of the taxiway may need to be cut out and filled in low spots to maintain a level taxiway using the existing soil in taxiway as much as possible.  Select fill to be brought in if needed.

**Approval Process:** These proposed changes will be subject to review and approval by the Owner. All changes are to be documented and agreed upon through a formal amendment to the existing contract.

**Conclusion:** The intention of this addendum is to achieve cost savings and enhanced project delivery through thoughtful modifications. We appreciate your consideration of these proposals and look forward to your feedback.

### For More Information Contact:

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
